response.overview: Discover the prayer that's changing lives!  The Prayer of Jabez: Jabez cried out to the God of Israel, "Oh, that you would bless me and enlarge my territory! Let your hand be with me, and keep me from harm so that I will be free from pain." And God granted his request. I Chronicles 4:10 NIV  Hidden deep within the Old Testament, the prayer of Jabez is the latest revelation to intrigue and inspire millions, while illuminating the life of one of the Bible's lesser-known figures. Through the remarkably practical and direct request of Jabez, can the power and protection of God begin enhancing your life now?
response.title: The Gift of Jabez
